Name: QualityStatementName
Description: Name of the QualityStatement using the DDI Name structure.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the QualityStatement. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the QualityStatement. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: QualityStandardReference
Description: A formal description of a quality standard, and the quality concepts which it requires.

Name: OtherStatementOfQuality
Description: Describes the steps taken to ensure quality that are not related to a specific standard. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat the OtherQualityStatement for differing content if needed.

Name: ComplianceStatement
Description: A descriptive statement regarding the application of the selected standard or other means of quality control.
